item.title: Creating Basic Python C Extensions - Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial was built using Python 3.6. The official documentation can be found here: Extending and Embedding the Python Interpreter In this tutorial we are going to take a look at how you can create a really simple Python module using the C programming language. I felt this was a good topic to cover as I personally struggled with finding succinct documentation that worked and showed me the basics.
